dashboard.label: Risk Exposure Overview
dashboard.description: Visual summary of current firewall policy risk exposure and threat indicators across environments.

search.query: index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:risk | stats avg(risk_score) as avg_risk by device_name
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:risk | sort - risk_score | table rule_id, rule_name, device_name, risk_score, risk_type, source_zone, destination_zone limit=10
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:risk | stats count by risk_type
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:risk | timechart avg(risk_score) as avg_risk by device_name
